title: Just Another Illegal Leave Of Revolutionaries

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, select someone to interrogate.
- During the day, you may choose to... dispose of... your target. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock, control, and redirect immune.
- Your interrogated target will be kidnapped and missing from the next day, all town will be notified that they are missing, but not as to why.
- They cannot perform any Day abilities or vote.
- You may privately speak with your target, and they may speak with you.
- You do not lose all remaining executions if you execute a Townie because we can just call it collateral damage.
